name: Connecticut Robusto
additionalNotes: the first blends to feature T13, a hybrid leaf developed by Ram Rodriguez himself that most closely resembles San VincenteFor the Connecticut version, Ram pairs an Ecuador Connecticut leaf overtop Dominican Negrito binder and a tri-country long-filler blend of Dominican, Colombian, and US tobaccos. Notching in at a mellow to medium body, Cimarron Connecticut is a unique spicy-sweet mixture with a naturally creamy core, and cedar-driven finish.
